anon.comment: Wow {{user}}, you look ready to hack!

christmas.comment: Merry Christmas, {{user}}! I hope you've been good for Santa!
christmas.commentMe: Merry Christmas! I've been good this year!

devil.comment: Naughty little {{user}}! How's Hell going for ya?
devil.commentMe: Hehehe, wanna join me down here?

mask.comment: Good job {{user}}! Don't wanna get anyone sick!

megumin.comment:
Oh, blackness shrouded in light, frenzied blaze clad in night...
In the name of the crimson demons, let the collapse of thine origin manifest.
Summon before me the root of thy power hidden within the lands of the kingdom of demise!

EXPLOSION!
